room_title: Escape room "Taphophobia" by The Crooked Key in Steamboat Springs
room_description:
You find yourself stuck in a dream of Edgar's, trying to escape the grave!
This high tech escape room offers a magical feel when solving puzzles. With no padlocks to fiddle with, you are left to really explore your surroundings and think outside of the box while figuring out your next step. No prior Poe knowledge is needed to enjoy this game.
